LanguageData.SkavenWarpMutatedSpasm.description: Warp mutated body part. This body part suffers from recurring spasm, it works rather well but the constant motion burn calories.
LanguageData.SkavenWarpMutatedArmour.label: warp mutated: growth
LanguageData.SkavenWarpMutatedArmour.description: Warp mutated body part. Hard growth poking out, ugly to look at and gets in the way.
